config.invmove.title: InvMove Config
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.enable:
Enable movement while inside inventories.
You can manually turn off certain inventories below.
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.sneak:
Allow sneaking while inside inventories.
(It can be distracting when shift-clicking items)
tooltip.config.invmove.movement.textFiel: Disable movement in inventories when a text field is focused.
tooltip.config.invmove.background.enable:
Hides the background tint while inside inventories.
You can manually turn off certain inventories below.
key.invmove.unrecognized.desc: Unrecognized GUIs show up here once they have been interacted with.
